headline: US rig count up one as prices increase
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was unchanged this week, the latest count Tuesday by Baker Hughes shows, with 247 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 304 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up one from last week at 546 rigs. A year ago, 589 rigs were active. The count shows that 412 rigs sought oil, up three from the previous week, and 125 explored ...
